pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, May 12, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, May 12, 2017:

Woodbridge, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will tour the Woodbridge Group plant and hold a media availability.

8214 Kipling Avenue
Woodbridge, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for tour
  • Open coverage for media availability
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:30 a.m. via employee entrance

Downsview, Ontario

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at a fundraiser organized in support of The Italy Earthquake Relief Fund.

Ballroom
Montecassino Hotel
3710 Chesswood Drive
Downsview, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks only
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:45 a.m. via the North entrance
